name: Brawl
description:
Brawl is the fine art of injuring other people with only your natural weapons. For humans, this involves punches, kicks, elbows, and the like. For a werewolf, it also covers the powerful teeth and claws of her non-human forms. Brawl reflects the character’s experience in actual fights alongside any formal martial arts training.

Experienced brawlers need to be ruthless and brutal, willing to fight on through loose teeth and broken bones to make the other guy fall first.

levels.one: You picked fights in the schoolyard.
levels.two: You can hold your own in a bar-room brawl.
levels.three: You’ve been in your fair share of fights and have come away on top.
levels.four: You could be a real contender on the MMA circuit.
levels.five: You are a deadly weapon in your Homid form; in Crinos, you can fight a war and expect to win.

possessedBy: Police, Thugs, Soldiers, Werewolves, Self-Defense Instructors
specialties: Boxing, Wrestling, Dirty Infighting, Weaponless Martial Arts (Judo, Karate, Tae Kwon Do, etc.), Kailindo
